content.text:
# Draft:The Heritage College

‎The Heritage College is a college in Anandapur, Kolkata. It was established in 2001.It offers undergraduate courses. It is affiliated to Calcutta University.
Courses
* Bengali
* English (M.A)
* Hindi
* History
* Psychology
* Physics
* Chemistry
* Mathematics
* Economics
* Psychology
* Accountancy & Finance
* Marketing (B.Com)

* List of social work schools
* Education in India
* Education in West Bengal
